channel.title: AriaScape - Dev Team Needed - Serious Server
channel.description:
I am looking for a development team to start a completely new server, I will fund the whole operation and I'm damn serious about this.
[b]What I will provide[/b]
[ul][*]Website (I have paid version of vBulletin 4.0) / AriaScape.com Domain - Full webserver [*]VPS (CPU:4.0GZ RAM:6GB DDR3 Disk:100GB Bandwidth:1000GB)[/ul]
I am only looking for server coders who can provide the following features:
[ul][*]317 Source [*]Web client [*]Stable Economy [*]All working skills [*]Members Area/Items/Crowns and Features [*]Based only in Yanille, All skills, training around Yanille. [*]XP lamps for voting, purchase items via site - auto add in-game. [*]Hiscores[/ul]
I'm also looking for GFX artists.
For a full list of features and more in-depth requirements please add me on Skype.
This server will have full forums and website, f2p and p2p. Coders will receive percentages of profits and PayPal cash for their work.
